DOC.brief_summary: Using an adult lung bench model of non invasive ventilation, the aim of the study is to compare an experimental system of breath-synchronized vibrating mesh nebulizer to a conventional vibrating mesh nebulizer during non invasive ventilation in terms of inhaled and lost doses.
DOC.brief_title: In Vitro Assessment of a Breath-synchronized Vibrating Mesh Nebulizer During Non Invasive Ventilation
DOC.criteria: Not applicable (in vitro study) hypersensitivity (allergic) reactions to aminoglycosides
